You too can contribute to the creation of a comfortable and inclusive workplace where everyone feels valued and appreciated.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Apart from peer-to-peer recognition, MS Dynamics 365 and Power Platform practice encourages dynamic thinking, easy-going attitude, contribution to extra mile activities acting as a Practice Ambassador. Dedicated practice badges with the accumulative effect are created to mark various occasions and make rewarding a valuable part of the recognition.
